Title: Calypso Jumbo Hammock in Yellow Colour

Details.Dimensions:: H 60 x W 30 x D 24 (All Dimensions are in Inches)

Description: Hangit provides you with the Best quality Hammock swings available in Indian market. Selection includes fabric, quilted, hand woven, and classic rope designs made from a variety of comfortable, weather hardy materials. Hammock is a sling made of fabric, rope, or netting, suspended between two or more points, used for swinging, sleeping, or resting. It normally consists of one or more cloth panels, or a woven network of twine or thin rope stretched with ropes between two firm anchor points such as trees or posts.
